meanings.definition: One who steers a ship or vehicle.
meanings.sent1: The steerer navigated the boat through the rough waters.
meanings.sent2: The bus driver is the steerer of the vehicle.
meanings.sent3: The steerer joked that the ship had a mind of its own.
meanings.sent4: As the steerer of his own destiny, he charted a new course in life.
meanings.sent5: The steerer skillfully guided the car around the sharp turn.

meanings.definition: A person who guides or directs others.
meanings.sent1: The team captain acted as the steerer during the group project.
meanings.sent2: The tour guide served as the steerer for the hiking expedition.
meanings.sent3: The steerer playfully led the group on a scavenger hunt.
meanings.sent4: She was the steerer of the discussion, ensuring everyone stayed on topic.
meanings.sent5: The steerer provided clear instructions for the team to follow.

meanings.sent1: The ship's wheel is a crucial steerer for controlling direction.
meanings.sent2: The joystick on the gaming console acts as the steerer for the character.
meanings.sent3: The steerer on the toy car was broken, causing it to veer off course.
meanings.sent4: The steerer on the remote-controlled boat allowed for precise movements.
meanings.sent5: The steerer on the bicycle helped the rider turn smoothly.
